short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the max-width style for reports in Google Admin Console Security Center Dashboard and Investigation Tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When visiting the Google Admin Console's Security Center Dashboard and clicking on a link to "View Report," the resulting page content normally displays with a max-width of 1024 pixels. Installing this extension removes the max-width style setting for that div. Additionally, this extension adjusts the max-width setting for reports in the Investigation Tool from 1600px to 2100px.
